review: I love this thing. I only had to call Amazon help desk once to get it working correctly (I am quite illiterate when it comes to electronics and they were super helpful). We can play games, access our Netflix and HBO Go, as well as Amazon Prime choices. We NEVER use our cable anymore!!! The DVR has become a lonely screen that we only look at when its a season premier.I HIGHLY recommend. We are taking it in our camper for Memoral Day and will try to use it at the campground!
author: Sharon
